oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hallmarks of Country Music - Lynn Anderson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is of an interview of Lynn Anderson (musician). The interview is hosted by Rick Phillips (army sergeant/ radio host) for the Hallmarks of Country Music segment. The tape was recorded on an unidentified date.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Lynn Anderson; Rick Phillips
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Promotion for Hallmarks of Country Music featuring Rick Phillips introducing Lynn Anderson -- (01:26) Hallmarks tune [featuring Rick Phillips introduction voiceover] ([Unidentified]) -- (02:06) V. A. tax information commercial spot hosted by Rick Phillips -- (02:39) Listen to a Country Song (Lynn Anderson) -- (05:16) Phillips inquires how Anderson discovered ""Listen to a Country Song,"" and Phillips inquires about Anderson's road work -- (08:38) Flattery Will Get You Everywhere (Lynn Anderson) -- (10:52) Phillips performs a state tax information radio spot -- (11:22) Ride, Ride, Ride (Lynn Anderson) -- (13:07) Anderson reflects on how she got her first recording contract, and Anderson discusses her time on the Lawrence Welk Show -- (15:19) Fool Me (Lynn Anderson) -- (17:25) Postal commercial spot hosted by an unidentified host -- (17:54) Keep Me in Mind (Lynn Anderson) -- (20:34) Veteran's Benefits commercial radio spot hosted by Phillips -- (21:06) Smile For Me (Lynn Anderson) -- (23:43) Anderson discusses how more types of songs are being accepted as country, and Phillips inquires how she recorded ""Ride, Ride, Ride"" -- (26:46) If I Kiss You (Lynn Anderson) -- (28:59) Stoux Indian Project commercial spot hosted by Phillips -- (29:48) Crib death commercial spot hosted by an unidentified host -- (30:28) Top of the World (Lynn Anderson) -- (33:12) Phillips inquires as to the story of how Anderson had ""Top of the World"" recorded before the Carpenters, and Anderson praises horses -- (37:03) You're My Man (Lynn Anderson) -- (39:37) Planned Parenthood commercial spot hosted by an unidentified host -- (40:04) Sing About Love (Lynn Anderson) -- (42:15) Project Ahead commercial spot hosted by Phillips -- (43:10) Talkin' to the Wall (Lynn Anderson) -- (45:48) Anderson reflects on working with Warner and the success she received with ""Rose Garden"" -- (47:50) Rose Garden (Lynn Anderson) -- (50:34) Love commercial spot hosted by an unidentified man and child -- (51:25) What a Man, My Man is (Lynn Anderson) -- (53:34) Hallmarks outro tune [featuring Phillips outro voiceover] ([Unidentified]) -- (55:38) Phillips introduces next week's guest: Seldom Scene -- (55:54) The Tie That Bonds (Seldom Scene) -- (56:41) Mike Auldridge and John Duffey reflect on how the band had evolved based on older bands -- (58:38) Everybody Slide [featuring Rick Phillips outro voiceover] (Seldom Scene)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Insert is of program information. The insert features time stamps.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Anderson, Lynn, 1947-2015; Phillips, Rick;
